Class RestaurantApp

  • Object
    • RestaurantApp

  • public class RestaurantApp
extends Object
    The main application where the RRPSS works. This class provides the interface for the user.
    Author:
    Edwin Candinegara, Kenrick, Deka Auliya Akbar, Yanhan, Liling

    • Method Detail

      • print

        private static void print(Object line)
        An alias for System.out.print(). This method makes it shorter in writing the code.
        Parameters:
        line - the String which is going to be printed

      • println

        private static void println(Object line)
        An alias for System.out.println(). This method makes it shorter in writing the code.
        Parameters:
        line - the String which is going to be printed

      • println

        private static void println()
        An alias for System.out.print() but only prints a newline character. The difference between this method and println(Object) is that this method does not take any argument. This method is only used to write a newline character.

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Main method for the RRPSS application.
        Parameters:
        args - Input from the command line
